meanings.definition: Not associated with any particular brand or company.
meanings.sent1: The plain white t-shirt was brandless.
meanings.sent2: She preferred brandless products to avoid high prices.
meanings.sent3: The brandless backpack was so simple, it made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of logos, her brandless style stood out like a lone star.
meanings.sent5: The brandless packaging made it hard to remember where she bought it.

meanings.sent2: He chose the brandless option to save money.
meanings.sent3: The brandless shoes were so plain, they almost disappeared.
meanings.sent4: Her brandless bag blended in with the crowd, unnoticed.
meanings.sent5: The brandless jar looked like it came from a secret pantry.

meanings.definition: Without a recognizable logo or trademark.
meanings.sent1: The brandless phone had a sleek design.
meanings.sent2: They preferred the brandless version for its simplicity.
meanings.sent3: The brandless hat made him look like a mysterious spy.
meanings.sent4: Her brandless watch seemed to stop time itself.
meanings.sent5: The brandless car moved silently through the night.
